{"id":1205842775,"question_id":3337,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1710643328,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1205842775/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Substrings Starting and Ending with Given Character","memory":"44.8 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long countSubstrings(String s, char c) {\n        \n        int len = s.length();\n        \n        long res = 0;\n        \n        \n        int cnt= 0 ;\n        for(int i=0; i<len ; i++){\n            if(s.charAt(i)==c)\n                cnt++;\n        }\n        // System.out.println(cnt);\n        \n        for(int i=cnt; i>0; i--){\n            res+=i;\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-substrings-starting-and-ending-with-given-character","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
